{"step_by_step_thinking": "The first line of management in any emergency situation, including severe bleeding, is to ensure the patient's airway is clear and they are able to breathe. This is a fundamental principle of emergency medicine and is part of the ABC (Airway, Breathing, Circulation) approach to patient care.
